statuses.name: todo
statuses.description: Tasks that are planned but not yet started

statuses.name: ongoing
statuses.description: Tasks that are currently in progress

statuses.name: onhold
statuses.description: Tasks that are temporarily paused or blocked

statuses.name: completed
statuses.description: Tasks that have been successfully finished

statuses.name: failed
statuses.description: Tasks that could not be completed successfully
